settings.content: It is possible to make breaking changes to your store here. Do not edit these settings unless you're absolutely sure of what you're doing!

settings.label: Primary Domain
settings.info: Enter the domain of the primary store -- the one that all users should see by default. (Do NOT include www or http:// or https://)

settings.label: Secondary Domain
settings.info: Enter the domain of the secondary store -- the one that only users from certain countries should see. (Do NOT include www or http:// or https://)

settings.label: Primary Store Name
settings.info: Enter the name you wish to use for the Primary store (this will also appear on the Store Switcher)

settings.label: Secondary Store Name
settings.info: Enter the name you wish to use for the Secondary store (this will also appear on the Store Switcher)

settings.label: This Store is the Primary Store
settings.info: Check this box if this store is the primary store

settings.label: Secondary store Country Codes
settings.info: Enter a comma-separated list of the country codes that should redirect to the secondary store (example: FR,UK,BG)

settings.label: Redirect to Root
settings.info: Check this box if you want to redirect to the site root, instead of the corresponding page a user might be on

settings.label: Fallback Delay
settings.info: Enter the delay (in ms) before fallback kicks in

settings.label: Whitelist URL Paths
settings.info: Enter a comma-separated list of url paths to ignore (ex. `/apps/store-locator,/blogs`)

settings.label: Enable Store Switcher
settings.info: Check if you want to enable a store switcher on your store. Be sure you enable or disable on both stores equally
